webscript.description:
Queries the Repository for User and/or Group authorities
Parameters:
  • filter (Mandatory) Returns those users and/or groups with a partial match on shortName. You can use the pattern matching characters * to match zero or more characters or ? to match one character.
  • authorityType (Optional) [all|user|group] Determines which authority types to return. Default is all if parameter not specified.
  • site (Optional) site shortname. Scopes the user search to a particular site
  • defGroupsFor (Optional) site shortname. Scopes the default groups search to a particular site

Returns an Array of authorities in JSON format.
